Detailed Description

OAuthRequest represents the request and can be serialized.

OAuth parameters:
    - oauth_consumer_key 
    - oauth_token
    - oauth_signature_method
    - oauth_signature 
    - oauth_timestamp 
    - oauth_nonce
    - oauth_version
    - oauth_verifier
    ... any additional parameters, as defined by the Service Provider.
